mapper.sql: /*[TbBcpcAthrApp.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT APPL_NO , ROL_ID , USR_ID , ORG_CD , APVL_YN , APPL_DT , APPL_RSN_CONT , APPL_STAT_CD , APVL_USR_ID , APVL_DTTM , APVL_RFS_RSN_CONT , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM TB_BCPC_ATHR_APP WHERE APPL_NO = #{appl_no, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
